Question: His family, at the time, were struggling financially meaning it was difficult for them to support this person's ambitions.
Hints: This person began performing at The Comedy Store and in 1982, appeared on the televised stand-up show An Evening at the Improv.
This person met model and actress Jenny McCarthy in 2005 and made their relationship public in June 2006.
In that same year, this person reprised his role as Ace Ventura in Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls.
